gremlins

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • gremlins.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Immobile, Mobile

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Base abstract Entity class. Everything on screen is extended from the entity class
